name: Colony Stockpiles
desc: Stockpile your colony's resources here. Any commodities placed in this submarket are added to the colony's stored reserves and automatically used to support production and operations. The player cannot directly purchase from or sell to this submarket. Depositing enough of a commodity helps the colony avoid temporary shortages. Any commodities placed here will be absorbed into the colonyâ€™s stockpiles at the start of each day."
